Pre-Game Insights: Houston went 41-41 overall with a 27-14 record at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Rockets averaged 7.8 steals, 4.6 blocks and 12.2 turnovers per game last season.
New York went 50-32 overall with a 23-18 record on the road a season ago.
The Knicks averaged 16.7 points off of turnovers, 16.3 second-chance points and 28.4 bench points last season.
